nodes.text: Imperial Center Today was a Coruscanti publication issued since at least the Galactic Empire's founding in 19 BBY.

In 2 ABY, the magazine published a debate, titled "A LONG TIME AGO…: The Zhell and the Taungs Are Names to Conjure By, But the Truth About These Long-Lost Combatants Is Hard to Pin Down" regarding the verses of Dha Verda Werda and its connection to either the Zhell-Taung War or the Mandalorians, with the article being written by Eschul Shaywa.
